title: My Wicked Heart
description: He's an ex-convict.I am the prized daughter of a family known for their name.We always knew it couldn't work, but that didn't mean we wouldn't try.But when we did, it was all torn apart.He was locked away.And I was helpless to stop the mass destruction that followed.He was wicked to my heart.And just like poison, the effects can be dangerous.
author: T.L.  Smith
